bt.torrent

Class Bitfield

  • java.lang.Object
    • bt.torrent.Bitfield

  • public class Bitfield
extends Object
    Status of torrent's data. Instances of this class are not thread-safe. External synchronization should be used in case of concurrent access.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Bitfield.PieceStatus
      Status of a particular piece.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Bitfield(byte[] value, int piecesTotal)
      Creates bitfield based on a bitmask.
      Bitfield(int piecesTotal)
      Creates empty bitfield.
      Bitfield(List<ChunkDescriptor> chunks)
      Creates "local" bitfield from a list of chunk descriptors.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      byte[] getBitmask() 
      int getPiecesComplete() 
      int getPiecesRemaining() 
      Bitfield.PieceStatus getPieceStatus(int pieceIndex) 
      int getPiecesTotal() 
      void markComplete(int pieceIndex)
      Signal that a piece has been completed and verified.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Bitfield

        public Bitfield(List<ChunkDescriptor> chunks)
        Creates "local" bitfield from a list of chunk descriptors.
        Parameters:
        chunks - List of torrent's chunk descriptors.
        Since:
        1.0

      • Bitfield

        public Bitfield(int piecesTotal)
        Creates empty bitfield. Useful when peer does not communicate its' bitfield (e.g. when he has no data).
        Parameters:
        piecesTotal - Total number of pieces in torrent.
        Since:
        1.0

      • Bitfield

        public Bitfield(byte[] value,
                int piecesTotal)
        Creates bitfield based on a bitmask. Used for creating peers' bitfields.
        Parameters:
        value - Bitmask that describes status of all pieces. If position i is set to 1, then piece with index i is complete and verified.
        piecesTotal - Total number of pieces in torrent.
        Since:
        1.0

    • Method Detail

      • getBitmask

        public byte[] getBitmask()
        Returns:
        Bitmask that describes status of all pieces. If position i is set to 1, then piece with index i is in Bitfield.PieceStatus.COMPLETE_VERIFIED status.
        Since:
        1.0

      • getPiecesTotal

        public int getPiecesTotal()
        Returns:
        Total number of pieces in torrent.
        Since:
        1.0

      • getPiecesComplete

        public int getPiecesComplete()
        Returns:
        Number of pieces that have status Bitfield.PieceStatus.COMPLETE_VERIFIED.
        Since:
        1.0

      • getPiecesRemaining

        public int getPiecesRemaining()
        Returns:
        Number of pieces that have status different from Bitfield.PieceStatus.COMPLETE_VERIFIED. I.e. it's the same as getPiecesTotal() - getPiecesComplete()
        Since:
        1.0

      • getPieceStatus

        public Bitfield.PieceStatus getPieceStatus(int pieceIndex)
        Parameters:
        pieceIndex - Piece index (0-based)
        Returns:
        Status of the corresponding piece.
        Since:
        1.0
        See Also:
        DataDescriptor.getChunkDescriptors()

      • markComplete

        public void markComplete(int pieceIndex)
        Signal that a piece has been completed and verified. In case with "local" bitfield an additional check of the corresponding chunk descriptor's status is performed. If the chunk is not in DataStatus.VERIFIED status, an exception is thrown.
        Parameters:
        pieceIndex - Piece index (0-based)
        Since:
        1.0
        See Also:
        DataDescriptor.getChunkDescriptors()
